entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who is talking and expressing her concerns about going back to a certain place. She is close to tears.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one Hermione is talking to, and he seems surprised by what she has to say.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is a person who caught hold of Hermione when they were Disapparating. He was too strong for her to get rid of.

relationships.description: Yaxley caught hold of Hermione when they were Disapparating.
Harry thinks Yaxley cannot get into Grimmauld Place.
